casebody.data:
Richard Frederick POWELL, III, Petitioner,
v.
The EIGHTH JUDICIAL DISTRICT COURT of the State of Nevada, IN AND FOR the COUNTY OF CLARK; and the Honorable Eric Johnson, District Judge, Respondents,
and
Renee Baker, Warden; and the State of Nevada, Real Parties in Interest. No. 79458
No. 79172 Supreme Court of Nevada. FILED SEPTEMBER 05, 2019

Vacate. Grant.
